text: Caner Koca (born 14 April 1996) is a Turkish footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Sakaryaspor. == Club career == Koca is a youth exponent from Fenerbahçe S.K.. He made his Süper Lig debut at 31 May 2015 against Kasımpaşa SK. He replaced Dirk Kuyt in extra time in a 2-0 home win. ==International career== Caner debuted for the Turkey U21 team in a 1-0 loss to Germany U21 on 10 November 2016.http://www.tff.org/default.aspx?pageID=284&ftxtID;=26189 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Fenerbahçe S.K. footballers Category:Samsunspor footballers Category:Süper Lig players Category:TFF First League players Category:TFF Second League players Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkey youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Caner Koca
